title: Claypot Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Extensive Vietnamese and Chinese food menu. Has labeled veg dishes which include veggie fried rice, tofu veggie claypot, veggie chow fun, veggie tofu curry, soy chicken curry, soy chicken/ham or tofu bahn mi, tofu spring rolls, soy chicken and soy shrimp spring rolls, pot stickers, banana egg rolls, and others. Keeps on hand soymilk for Thai ice tea.
